first_para: Linda June Riordan (née Haigh 31 May 1953) is an English Labour Co-operative politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Halifax from 2005 general election to 2015.

full.extract:
Linda June Riordan (née Haigh 31 May 1953) is an English Labour Co-operative politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Halifax from 2005 general election to 2015.
